title: Jane-HK
author: Jane-HK
content: The platform I use has launched the pledge interest, similar to renting mining machines, with high returns. I am a newbie, I would like to ask is it true that the revenue is 100%?One more question, why can't I attach pictures

comments.author: mocacinno
comments.body: Sounds a lot like you're describing cloudmining... 99,9% of those companys are scams.The ones that aren't are selling you 100% of their risk for a (very small, potential) part of the profit. Not a good deal...But since you say they are offering 100% revenue, i'll go out on a limb and say the odds of it being a scam are 99,999999% instead of 99,9%As for your second question: nobody can upload images... You can use a service like imgur to upload the image you want to share, then hotlink it (if the service you're using allows hotlinking).

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Jane-HK on July 12, 2022, 06:44:04 AMThe platform I use has launched the pledge interest, similar to renting mining machines, with high returns. I am a newbie, I would like to ask is it true that the revenue is 100%?As said, 99.99% sure it's a scam. Too good to be true ("high returns") should ring the alarm, if cloud mining doesn't. Stay safe.Quote from: Jane-HK on July 12, 2022, 06:44:04 AMOne more question, why can't I attach pictures As said, you have to upload somewhere else and get links.Even more, you're newbie on this forum and only the link will be visible, not the actual picture, until you rank up. Of course, somebody may quote it and make it visible for you.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: The previous posts of the author in the Chinese boardQuoteA product recommended by a friend, similar to mining, is highly profitable. Can anyone please help me. How do you add a picture to the post? I can't put it on.A "product" recommended by " a friend", is "similar" to mining. Forget the 100% return even if they claim 20% I would is 99.99% a scam.If you can't post a picture following the above instructions theta t least link the website in question, if there is no website then the chances for it to be a scam have just grown to 101%.Quote from: mocacinno on July 12, 2022, 06:53:50 AMSounds a lot like you're describing cloudmining... 99,9% of those companys are scams.Might be some liquidity mining scheme, lately those have started popping up like mushrooms, far more than the cloud mining trend which is, fortunately, losing steam.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Why not tell us what exactly platform you talking about or mention the website and let us check if their business is a scam?Any investment site or Cloud mining most of them are scams and there is no 100% revenue unless you are mining with a real miner and mine with a free power source. About attaching pictures you can't able to attach them since theymos disabled it due to abuse. You can only able to attach an image if you are a Jr. member above but you can able to put the direct image link here.If you become a Jr. member in the future you can follow this [Guide] How to Add image on Bitcoin Talk Post?

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: Jane-HK on July 12, 2022, 06:44:04 AMThe platform I use has launched the pledged interest, similar to renting mining machines, with high returns. I am a newbie, I would like to ask is it true that the revenue is 100%?I believe this is one of the cloud mining or shady site which always pledge high interest. Just ask yourself how profitable is mining now that someone will promise you a high return.The best high interest now is you buy BTC now and keep it for the next halving.Quote from: Jane-HK on July 12, 2022, 06:44:04 AMOne more question, why can't I attach pictures That's because of your rank but if you provide the link to the image you want to attach, we can quote it for visibility.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Jane-HK on July 12, 2022, 06:44:04 AMThe platform I use has launched the pledge interest, similar to renting mining machines, with high returns. I am a newbie, I would like to ask is it true that the revenue is 100%?Be extra careful and vigilant, Bitcoin mining right now is not all that profitable, if a mining platform is making you an offer thats too good to be true, then its probably not true, so stay clear and do not throw your money away.QuoteOne more question, why can't I attach pictures I believe you've gotten your answer to this already, but just to add, as a newbie, you can not directly post pictures on the forum but you can share link to the picture and a member with a higher rank will help you to make the picture visible to others, you can start posting images when you become a junior member.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Jane-HK on July 12, 2022, 06:44:04 AM I am a newbie, I would like to ask is it true that the revenue is 100%?Good thing you are asking first rather than just going ahead to try, this forum is great place to ask these sort of questions, and it is great that you are taking advantage of the forum to that effect. You must have gotten both answers to the question you asked, you should never trust any venture that promises 100% return, whatever gives you a feeling of too good to be true is usually too good to be true do not second-guess it. I see you're definitely interested in owning some bitcoins of your own, it is a good plan but you must approach this plan patiently and with proper planning.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Jane-HK on July 12, 2022, 06:44:04 AMThe platform I use has launched the pledge interest, similar to renting mining machines, with high returns. I am a newbie, I would like to ask is it true that the revenue is 100%?One more question, why can't I attach pictures You got a merit from me.looks like you are fluent in english and chinesethe merit i gave you is to encourage you to continue posting.People that are fluent in chinese and english are valuable in crytpo you can find work here translating.you will eran a right to post photos with continued posting.

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: mocacinno on July 12, 2022, 06:53:50 AM i'll go out on a limb and say the odds of it being a scam are 99,999999% instead of 99,9%Quote from: NeuroticFish on July 12, 2022, 10:17:46 AMAs said, 99.99% sure it's a scam.Quote from: stompix on July 12, 2022, 01:03:39 PM I would is 99.99% a scam.Because I have bigger balls than these three fine gentlemen, I would like to add that small bit of % and say it's 100% scam,  (just kidding, of course, only about the balls' part).OP, are you aware that MiningRigRental, Nicehash, and other platforms have a HUGE amount of hashrate for "rent"? mind you, more often than not, the cost is just 100%+ some fees, so if a miner makes 10$ a day, you can almost always rent it for 10$ + a small fee, so it's not like the world has hashrate shortage issues and someone would offer you 50% extra on top of that 100%, if they desperately need to rent hashrate, they can acquire it from all those famous platforms, so why would anyone pay you anything extra when they can buy it there? it MOST certainly and 100% makes exactly no sense.
